entities.label: Ministry of Economy Trade and Industry (METI)
Sectoral Approach to Carbon Emission Reductions

edges.label: 1. Intelligence Intercepts
edges.tooltip: NSA derived intelligence from intercepts of Japanese officials discussing climate strategies.

edges.label: 2. Promotion of Approach
edges.tooltip: Japanese officials are promoting the sectoral approach despite international criticism.

edges.label: 3. Criticism Issued
edges.tooltip: Fatih Birol of the IEA issued warnings about the sectoral approach.

edges.label: 4. Criticism Issued
edges.tooltip: The European Union criticized Japan's sectoral approach.

edges.label: 5. Advocacy
edges.tooltip: Masakazu Toyoda discussed the strategic benefits of the sectoral approach.

edges.label: 6. Warning
edges.tooltip: Fatih Birol warned Japan about potential misinterpretations of their efforts.

edges.label: 7. Involvement
edges.tooltip: METI is involved in the promotion of the sectoral approach.

Sectoral Approach: Criticized by the IEA and EU for potential misinterpretations and strategic implications.
